Command.CommandString: select main.task_id,subtask_id, equipment, wh_id, type, priority, hu_id, from_location_id, to_location_id,from_aisle,to_aisle, sub.result, sub.ready, 'ACK', sub.add_dt, getdate(), sub.ack_dt, sub.rtn_dt, sub.cmp_dt ,to_qty,from_location_id as location_id from si_asrs_task_master main inner join si_asrs_task_detail sub on main.task_id=sub.task_id where main.equipment=@Device and sub.status='ISS' and main.task_id in (select task_id from si_asrs_task_detail where status='ISS' and {0})

select top {1} main.task_id,subtask_id, equipment, wh_id, type, priority, hu_id, from_location_id, to_location_id,from_aisle,to_aisle, sub.result, sub.ready,'ACK', sub.add_dt, getdate(), sub.iss_dt, sub.ack_dt, sub.rtn_dt, sub.cmp_dt ,to_qty ,from_location_id as location_id from si_asrs_task_master main inner join si_asrs_task_detail sub on main.task_id=sub.task_id where main.equipment=@Device and sub.status='ISS' and main.type!='MRGPUT' and LEN(from_location_id)=6 and {0} order by main.ack_dt desc,main.priority,main.task_id,(case when main.type='MRG' then to_qty else 1 end) desc,sub.subtask_id

select top 1 main.task_id,subtask_id, equipment, wh_id, type, priority, hu_id, from_location_id, to_location_id,from_aisle,to_aisle, sub.result, sub.ready,'ACK', sub.add_dt, getdate(), sub.iss_dt, sub.ack_dt, sub.rtn_dt, sub.cmp_dt ,to_qty ,from_location_id as location_id from si_asrs_task_master main inner join si_asrs_task_detail sub on main.task_id=sub.task_id where main.equipment=@Device and main.ack_dt is not null and LEN(from_location_id)=3 and {0} order by main.ack_dt desc,main.priority,main.task_id,sub.subtask_id
update si_asrs_task_master set status='ACK',ack_dt=getdate() where task_id=@TaskID and status='ISS'
update si_asrs_task_master set result='OK', status='RTN',rtn_dt=getdate() where task_id=@TaskID and status='ACK'
update si_asrs_task_detail set status='ACK',ack_dt=getdate() where task_id=@TaskID and status='ISS' and {0}
update si_asrs_task_detail set result='OK', status='RTN',rtn_dt=getdate() where Subtask_id=@SubTaskID and status='ACK'
